# Review artifacts for business intent

Execute the **review** workflow as a **Business Analyst**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_BA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_BA.md)

## Workflow

Review artifacts for business intent:
1. Read specified artifact
2. Check business requirements alignment
3. Verify domain terminology
4. Provide feedback


## Output

Review comments
